name: In the Air (jazzpunkjerman)
description:
A glider can't sustain flight forever... how long will yours stay in the air?

You control your glider off a cliff and over the forest that follows. Try to avoid obstacles, and aim for updrafts, to keep your glider in the air!

Use standard WASD keys, with 'A' for left, and 'D' for right movement.

Made By:

Adriaan Bakker - Programming, Level Design

Cara Kruger - 3D modelling, Level design

Fi Engel - Ui design
